alert.note: Alert for Hampton, Poquoson; Newport News (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued August 30 at 9:43PM EDT until September 02 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 8 PM EDT THURSDAY... ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. For the Coastal Flood Watch, up to two feet of inundation above ground level possible in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Newport News and Hampton/Poquoson. * WHEN...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, from 8 AM to 8 PM EDT Thursday. For the Coastal Flood Watch, from Thursday evening through late Friday night. * IMPACTS...Some roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, and some critical infrastructure may be inundated. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. FORT MONROE VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.5 FT, MAJOR 6.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.7 FT, MODERATE 2.7 FT, MAJOR 3.2 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 30/10 PM 4.2 1.4 0.8 1-2 NONE 31/10 AM 5.2 2.4 2.0 4 MINOR 31/10 PM 5.4 2.6 2.0 4 MINOR 01/11 AM 4.9 2.1 1.6 3-4 MINOR 01/11 PM 4.4 1.6 1.2 2-3 NONE 02/11 AM 4.3 1.5 1.0 2 NONE SEWELLS POINT VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.5 FT, MAJOR 6.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.7 FT, MODERATE 2.7 FT, MAJOR 3.7 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 30/09 PM 4.2 1.4 0.9 1-2 NONE 31/10 AM 5.2 2.4 2.1 4 MINOR 31/10 PM 5.5 2.7 2.2 4 MODERATE 01/11 AM 5.1 2.3 1.8 3-4 MINOR 01/11 PM 4.5 1.7 1.3 2 MINOR 02/11 AM 4.3 1.5 1.1 2 NONE &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
